original_text: They no longer have their valuable things. They suddenly die and they are still not wise.” ’ They no longer have their valuable things.
korean_text: 장막 줄이 그들에게서 뽑히지 아니하겠느냐 그들은 지혜가 없이 죽느니라

sentences.original_text: They no longer have their valuable things.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 더 이상 그들의 귀중한 것들을 가지고 있지 않다.

sentences.original_text: and they are still not wise.
